content.prompt: Which of the following reasons could explain why a firm might hire fewer workers?

choices.label: A decrease in the wage rate
An increase in the price of a substitute input
An increase in the price of the firm’s product
An increase in demand for the firm’s product

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply
